mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, GENDER, EMAIL, ENROLL_DATE, MEM_STATUS, FARMER_CODE, CAREER FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, GENDER, EMAIL, ENROLL_DATE, MEM_STATUS) VALUES(SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, #{memId}, #{memPwd}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{phone}, #{gender}, #{email}, SYSDATE, 'Y')
